casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
George Edward MULLINS, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158358
COA: 341506 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing an answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 14, 2019.
